Package gameClient

Class Ex2

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Ex2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Ex2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class is the main class of our Pokemon game. It create amazing GUI to imagine the algorithms behind, and have a fun experience from our project. The GUI part use at JFrame, and logic part use the api package and pokemon and agent classes. In this main class we express the OOP principle, additional to frame abilities.

    • isOnEdge

      private static boolean isOnEdge​(geo_location p, geo_location src, geo_location dest)
      Check if some 3D point is between two 3D positions, up to epsilon.
      Parameters:
      p - - 3D point
      src - - first 3D point
      dest - - last 3D point
      Returns:
      - true if is between two points
